name: stonetiledepot
overview:
Online reseller of natural stone and tile products.

The company utilizes excess inventory of various wholesalers and tile importers. By not investing in its own inventory, stonetiledepot is able to take advantage of low inventory costs and obtains discounts in excess of 50% compared to current market prices.

Company’s propriatery software enables hundreds of specialized wholesalers to upload their inventory and prices in a life feed, therefore, providing real time inventory across the country.
